title: The Block Presents: The Rise of Crypto Derivatives - Brought to you by CME Group
content: The demand for crypto risk management solutions grows in 2021, as the crypto market continues to see notable price action. Join The Block’s Director of News Frank Chaparro along side CME Group and industry experts from Tradestation, and Ninja Trading, for a live webinar and Q&A session discussing recent trends in the crypto derivatives marketplace and what’s to come in the second half of 2021.

As the world’s leading and most diverse derivatives marketplace, CME Group is where the world comes to manage risk. Comprised of four exchanges – CME, CBOT, NYMEX and COMEX – CME Group offers the widest range of global benchmark products across all major asset classes, helping businesses everywhere mitigate the myriad of risks they face in today’s uncertain global economy.
